content:
north had bumper crops - surpluses!
britain was having a drought at the same time
north lots of farm land (65% of US farmland was actually in the north)
north gave britain lots of their crops
adding onto failure of cotton diplomacy w/ britain and south, britain had a substantial lifeline with north and they couldn't give that up

KEY PHRASE:
!! ** King Corn and King Wheat TRUMPED King Cotton ** !!
